original_text: Col-Hozeh's son, Shallun, repaired the Fountain Gate. He was the ruler of the region of Mizpah. Shallun built a roof over the Fountain Gate. He fixed its doors in their place, as well as their wooden bars and iron bars. Shallun also repaired the wall of the Pool of Siloam, near the king's garden. He repaired the wall as far as the steps that come down from the City of David.
korean_text: 샘문은 미스바 지방을 다스리는 골호세의 아들 살룬이 중수하여 문을 세우고 덮었으며 문짝을 달고 자물쇠와 빗장을 갖추고 또 왕의 동산 근처 셀라 못 가의 성벽을 중수하여 다윗 성에서 내려오는 층계까지 이르렀고

sentences.original_text: Col-Hozeh's son, Shallun, repaired the Fountain Gate.
sentences.korean_translation: 골호세의 아들 살룬이 샘 문을 수리했습니다.

sentences.original_text: He was the ruler of the region of Mizpah.
Shallun built a roof over the Fountain Gate.
sentences.korean_translation: 살룬은 샘 문 위에 지붕을 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He fixed its doors in their place
as well as their wooden bars and iron bars.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나무 막대와 철 막대도 설치했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Shallun also repaired the wall of the Pool of Siloam
sentences.korean_translation: 살룬은 또 실로암 못의 벽을 수리했습니다.

sentences.original_text: He repaired the wall as far as the steps
that come down from the City of David.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 계단은 다윗 성에서 내려오는 길이었습니다.
